name: Frank McCoppin Elementary School
description: School Type: Early Education, Elementary School Serves grades: PreK, TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 Delivering an individualized approach through a diverse support staff of a speech clinician, a school psychologist, a social worker, and a Resources Special Program (RSP) teacher with a paraeducator. School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper
